original_title: The WW2 Boomer Myth Is Breaking Down And All The Lies Along With It   — The Donald
article_summary: "Article discusses the breakdown of the 'Boomer Myth' in relation to World War 2, with some arguing that Boomers didn't fight in the war but rather were the generation born after it. The debate also touches on the perceived blame for societal issues, with some attributing them to the Boomer generation's policies and mindset."</s>
